channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gen Z and millennials are donating less to charity than Boomers—and it could worsen America’s ‘generosity crisis’
item.description: Fears of a “generosity crisis” have dogged nonprofit fundraisers for much of this century.

item.title: David Solomon’s pay hinges on whether Goldman is more than just a bank
item.description: The retention packages for Chief Executive Officer David Solomon and President John Waldron give the latter more reason to stick around to run the pla...

item.title: Bitcoin ETFs clock highest inflows since January as Bitcoin reclaims $90,000
item.description: Bitcoin ETFs pulled in $381 million on Monday as the U.S. dollar weakened.

item.title: What is stage 0 breast cancer? Tina Knowles, recently diagnosed and treated for stage 1, said she’d never heard of it—and she’s not alone
item.description: "I didn't know that there was a stage 0,” Knowles said. Here's what it means.

item.title: The Polymarket Pope: Online bettors are feeling confident about who the new pontificate will be
item.description: The major contenders hail from Italy, the Philippines, Hungary, and Ghana.
